metadata.author: Samuel Hahnemann
metadata.title: Materia Medica Pura
metadata.description: Hahnemann's original provings, forming the foundation of homeopathic practice.
metadata.philosophy: Pure Provings and Totality of Symptoms

keynotes: Anxious impatience, tossing about in agony.
Mental anguish and fear of death.
Tingling and numbness in various parts.

mindSymptoms.description: Fear is the most prominent feature, with great anxiety and restlessness.
symptoms: Music is unbearable, makes him sad.

keynotes: Violent delirium, desire to bite and strike.
Dilated pupils and intolerance to light.

mindSymptoms.description: Furious delirium, with hallucinations and a desire to escape or hide.
symptoms: Sees ghosts, hideous faces, and various insects.
